item.title: Hayley Atwell and Rupert Everett Join ‘Rivals’ Season 2 Cast on Disney+ as Legendary Jilly Cooper Characters
item.description: Atwell will be starring as Helen Gordon, Rupert Campbell-Black’s ex-wife, and Everett as show-jumping coach Malise Gordon.
